name: Landlore Navigator
oracle_text:
Whenever Landlore Navigator attacks, create a Map token.
At the beginning of your end step, if two or more artifacts entered under your control this turn, conjure a card named Thieving Magpie onto the battlefield.

name: Legion Reconsecrator
oracle_text:
Whenever Legion Reconsecrator attacks, exile up to one target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, conjure a duplicate of it into your graveyard. The duplicate perpetually becomes a black Skeleton with base power and toughness 3/1 in addition to its other colors and types.
When Legion Reconsecrator dies, return another target creature card with power or toughness 1 from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Scalesoul Gnome
oracle_text:
Trample, Haste
Whenever Scalesoul Gnome deals combat damage to a player, discover X, where X is that damage.
Whenever you play a card from exile, conjure a duplicate of it into your hand.

name: Mythweaver Poq
oracle_text:
Mythweaver Poq's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
Whenever one or more nontoken lands enter under your control, for each of them, conjure a duplicate of it onto the battlefield. This ability triggers only once each turn.

name: High Marshal Arguel
oracle_text: When High Marshal Arguel dies, conjure a card named Arguel's Blood Fast onto the battlefield and you may transform it. If you control an enchantment named Arguel's Blood Fast and a land named Temple of Aclazotz, instead create two 4/3 white and black Vampire Demon creature tokens with flying.

all_parts.name: Arguel's Blood Fast // Temple of Aclazotz

name: Kamachal, Ship's Mascot
oracle_text:
Menace
{R}: Kamachal, Ship's Mascot gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever Kamachal deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token. Then exile from that player's library a random card with mana value equal to the damage dealt. You may cast that card this turn.

name: Chitinous Crawler
oracle_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose target creature card in your graveyard. Conjure a duplicate of it into your graveyard.
Descend 8 — Exile a permanent card from your graveyard: You may play it. Activate only as a sorcery and only if there are eight or more permanent cards in your graveyard.

name: Colossal Chorus
oracle_text:
Starting intensity 2
Conjure X cards named Colossal Dreadmaw onto the battlefield, where X is this spell's intensity.
All Chorus cards you own intensify by 1.

name: Mycelic Ballad
oracle_text:
Starting intensity 2
Each player sacrifices X creatures and you gain X life, where X is this spell's intensity.
All Chorus cards you own intensify by 1.

name: Reflection Net
oracle_text:
Flash
When Reflection Net enters, exile target creature until Reflection Net leaves the battlefield.
{2}: Target creature you control becomes a copy of a creature card exiled with Reflection Net. Activate only as a sorcery and only once.

name: Brazen Boarding
oracle_text: Brazen Boarding deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If excess damage is dealt this way, conjure a card with mana value equal to that excess damage from Brazen Boarding's spellbook onto the battlefield. If that excess damage is 4 or greater, instead conjure a card named Admiral Beckett Brass onto the battlefield.

name: Merfolk Tunnel-Guide
oracle_text: When Merfolk Tunnel-Guide enters, you get a three-time boon with "Whenever one or more Merfolk enter under your control, target Merfolk creature you control explores."

name: Mycoid Resurrection
oracle_text: Fathomless descent — Each creature card in your graveyard perpetually gets +X/+X, where X is the number of permanent cards in your graveyard. Then return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Pirate's Landing
oracle_text: Draw a card. If mana from a Treasure was spent to cast this spell, seek a Pirate card instead.

name: Phantasmal Extraction
oracle_text:
If you weren't the starting player, this spell costs {1} less to cast.
Target opponent reveals each nonland card in their hand with mana value 4 or less. Choose a card revealed this way or a card in their graveyard. Exile that card.

name: Stalwart Speartail
oracle_text:
Enrage — Whenever Stalwart Speartail is dealt damage, other Dinosaurs you control and Dinosaur cards in your hand and library perpetually get +1/+1.
Whenever Stalwart Speartail attacks, Stalwart Speartail deals 1 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.

name: Wingbane Vantasaur
oracle_text:
Reach
When Wingbane Vantasaur enters, choose one —
• Conjure a card named Savage Stomp into your hand.
• Conjure a card named Naturalize into your hand.

name: Tan Jolom, the Worldwalker
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose up to one target artifact or land you control that isn't a creature or token. Until end of turn, it becomes a 3/3 Spirit creature with vigilance and double team in addition to its other types.

name: Herald's Reveille
oracle_text: Draw a card. If a permanent you controlled explored this turn, seek a Merfolk card instead.

name: Propagator Primordium
oracle_text:
When Propagator Primordium enters, conjure two cards named Propagator Primordium into your graveyard.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Propagator Primordium.
Remove three spore counters from Propagator Primordium: Return target Fungus creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Legion's Chant
oracle_text:
Starting intensity 3
Return any number of creature cards with total mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is Legion's Chant's intensity.
All Chorus cards you own intensify by 1.

name: Plunderer's Prize
oracle_text: Seek a nonland artifact card with mana value X or less and put it onto the battlefield. If a card with mana value less than X is put onto the battlefield this way, this spell perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} more to cast," then return this spell to its owner's hand.

name: Hymn to the Ages
oracle_text:
Starting intensity 1
Draw a number of cards equal to this spell's intensity.
All Chorus cards you own intensify by 1.

name: Caldera Breaker
oracle_text:
Trample
When Caldera Breaker enters, exile all Mountain cards from your library. When you do, Caldera Breaker deals that much damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.
When Caldera Breaker dies, put all cards exiled with it onto the battlefield under their owner's control. Conjure four cards named Volcanic Geyser into your library, then shuffle.

name: Radiant Smite
Ribald Shanty
oracle_text:
Starting intensity 2
This spell deals damage equal to its intensity to target creature or planeswalker.
All Chorus cards you own intensify by 1.

name: Cogwork Progenitor
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, you may exile another artifact you control or an artifact card in your graveyard. If you do, seek an artifact card. That card perpetually has base power and toughness 1/1 and becomes a Gnome creature in addition to its other types.

name: Valiant Batrider
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Valiant Batrider deals combat damage to a player, that player gets a one-time boon with "When you cast a noncreature spell, you may pay {1}. If you don't, each opponent draws a card."

name: Scalespeaker Shepherd
oracle_text:
When Scalespeaker Shepherd enters, draft a card from Scalespeaker Shepherd's spellbook.
Dinosaur spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

name: Dusk's Landing
oracle_text: Draw a card. If an opponent lost life this turn and you gained life this turn, seek two Vampire cards instead.
